item.title: Is the open source Drone CI/CD platform really free?
item.description: I have been implementing Drone CI/CD open source platform for many years, and many people would ask me, “Is Drone really free to use? How should I calculate the cost of using it for open source or importing it into my company’s internal team? Well, this article will take you to understand Drone used in open source or the internal team of the company need to pay attention to places, the official actually wrote a full page FAQ very detailed, the following is I organized a few points to you know.
